subject: docs(claude-md): add commit message format guidelines
body:
Add structured commit message format with required metadata footers
including Tags, Complexity, Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic, and
Semver fields to standardize commit documentation across the project.

Tags: docs, conventions, process
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01CESkpfF4g3duXkBEgKwxci
title: add commit message format guidelines
